data.title: Anna Nicole Smith weds Howard K. Stern
data.meta_description: Anna Nicole Smith married her long-time attorney and close confidante, Howard K. Stern, this morning at 10:30 am in Nassau, Bahamas. The wedding occurred only 18 days after the death of Anna's son Daniel, 20, from an accidental drug overdose in her Nassau hospital room on September 10. In a…
data.text:
(no subject) - (Anonymous)

IAWTC.

Agreed. Even if Anna is dumb as a bag of rocks, at least she didn't rush to marry this guy. They've worked together for so long so I'd assume that they know more about each other than some other celebrity couples.

That and he's obviously got a shitload of dirt on her.

i agree

I totally agree. anyone that watched the anna nicole show knew it was obvious that they were at least digging eachother. I say good for them and I hope they're happy.

I agree as well. I'm rooting for them and I pray Howard is the real father of the baby.

i call photoshop

where?

lol pwnd

Wow!! That definitely makes it seem like he is not the father then...this could be a perfect set up for them to try to fight for custody of the baby.

My thoughts exactly!

this is like a soap opera or something.

iawtc

Totally bizarre.

WHAT??

! EXACTLY !

WORD

exactly.

Smith then married 89-year-old oil tycoon J. Howard Marshall in June 1994. He died in 1990

Nice.

lol right --

Damn they need to edit their ish before they send it

I understand being the "first" to break the news but break it right

It is Star magazine though! Who knows if the article is even true.

He used his money to build a time machine to go back to his younger more care-free days. Unfortunately shoddy workmanship and insufficient technology botched the trip and he only made it to 1990. He realized he was still old and died of being, instantly, completely depressed.

You go you sassy things!

I know its up on people.com if that helps

Merci, mon amie.

(no subject) - confab_nation Expand

This is seriosuly getting good

We just need an hour long show on Maury now

Wow, this story gets weirder and weirder. I doubt getting married right after such a trauma is the best idea, but who am I to say? I hope they are happy, and that he provides the support she needs right now.

Maybe his early death caused them to realize that life is shorter than we think and we should live for today.

I seriously hope he is an ok guy. As much as I can't stand Anna Nicole she certainly needs some happiness right now.

On her show, it always seemed to me that he cared a lot about her and looked out for her.

she got married when her son died not long ago?!

..i suddenly dont feel sorry for her anymore.

Not picking on you, but do you feel the same way about Dog the Bounty Hunter? He got married the day after his daughter died in an accident.

Trust me, I could give a crap about Anna Nicole Smith. That being said, I would think that after a loss like that, you'd feel the need to celebrate life and love more urgently than before...

Same here. I actually scrolled down to make a similar reply to a similar comment. How the hell does her getting married negate the fact that she was devestated about her son's death? What -- are people now not allowed to celebrate or in any way do a positive thing within a three month buffer of any close tragedy??

Dog has had his marriage planned for a while. Also I think something was said that he was going to cancel the wedding

This was very sudden. Totally not planned well in advance.

She is completely immersed in grief, she can't be making a well thought out decision.

It's all very sad.

Anna, he's using you!!

Did you ever watch her show on E! ? It was so obvious that he loved her even then.

This is such a confusing mess. I don't even know what to think anymore.
